languages.text: "Далекие предки этого слуги возвели сие чудо, дабы племена могли поклоняться Богу-орлу, приносить Ему дары и говорить с Ним. Здесь этот слуга слушает и слышит. И несет волю Его своему племени".

"This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."
languages.original_text: "Далекие предки этого слуги возвели сие чудо, дабы племена могли поклоняться Богу-орлу, приносить Ему дары и говорить с Ним. Здесь этот слуга слушает и слышит. И несет волю Его своему племени".

traits.locale_text: "This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes may worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and talk to Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

"This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes may worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and talk to Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

"This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and talk to Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

"This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

"This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

languages.text: “此仆人的祖先建起了这座奇迹，这样我们的部落就可以崇拜鹰神，为祂献上祭品，与祂交流。此仆人就在这里聆听鹰神的话语，将祂的意志传达给这个部落。”
languages.original_text: "This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

traits.locale_text: “此仆人的祖先建起了这座奇迹，这样我们的部落就可以崇拜鹰神，为祂献上祭品，与祂交流。此仆人就在这里聆听鹰神的话语，将祂的意志传达给这个部落。”

languages.text: "Die uralten Ahnen dieses Dieners haben dieses Wunder errichtet, damit Stämme den Adler-Gott anbeten können, ihm Geschenke bringen und mit ihm sprechen. Hier hört und lernt dieser Diener. Und übermittelt seinem Stamm den Willen des Adler-Gottes."
languages.original_text: "This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

traits.locale_text: "Die uralten Ahnen dieses Dieners haben dieses Wunder errichtet, damit Stämme den Adler-Gott anbeten können, ihm Geschenke bringen und mit ihm sprechen. Hier hört und lernt dieser Diener. Und übermittelt seinem Stamm den Willen des Adler-Gottes."

languages.text: «Los antepasados de este siervo erigieron esta maravilla para que las tribus pudiesen rendir culto al Dios Águila, ofrecerle regalos y entrar en comunión con Él. Aquí es donde este siervo escucha y oye. Y después comunica Su voluntad a su tribu».
languages.original_text: "This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

traits.locale_text: «Los antepasados de este siervo erigieron esta maravilla para que las tribus pudiesen rendir culto al Dios Águila, ofrecerle regalos y hablar con Él. Aquí es donde este siervo escucha y oye. Y después comunica Su voluntad a su tribu».

languages.text: « Les ancêtres de ce serviteur ont érigé ce monument pour que les tribus puissent vénérer l'Aigle-Dieu, Lui faire des offrandes et communier avec Lui. C'est ici que ce serviteur s'installe pour entendre, écouter et transmettre Sa volonté à la tribu. »
languages.original_text: "This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

traits.locale_text: « Les ancêtres de ce serviteur ont érigé ce monument pour que les tribus puissent vénérer l'Aigle-Dieu, Lui faire des offrandes et Lui parler. C'est ici que ce serviteur s'installe pour entendre, écouter et transmettre Sa volonté à la tribu. »

languages.text: 「この下僕の古代の先祖は、種族が鷲＝神を崇拝し、貢物を持参し、そして神と交流できるように、この不思議なものを建立した。ここでこの下僕は耳を傾け、聴く。そして神の意志を彼の種族に伝えるのだ」
languages.original_text: "This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

traits.locale_text: 「この下僕の古代の先祖は、種族が鷲＝神を崇拝し、貢物を持参し、そして神と交流できるように、この不思議なものを建立した。ここでこの下僕は耳を傾け、聴く。そして神の意志を彼の種族に伝えるのだ」

languages.text: "Bu hizmetkârın kadim ataları, bu harikayı inşa etmişler ki kabileler Kartal Tanrı'ya ibadet edebilsin, ona hediyeler getirebilsin ve onunla konuşabilsin. Bu hizmetkâr, işte burada dinler ve anlar. Ardından onun arzularına kabilesine aktarır."
languages.original_text: "This servant's ancient forebears erected this wonder so that tribes can worship the Eagle-God, bring Him gifts, and commune with Him. Here is where this servant listens and hears. And relays His will to his tribe."

traits.locale_text: "Bu hizmetkârın kadim ataları, bu harikayı inşa etmişler ki kabileler Kartal Tanrı'ya ibadet edebilsin, ona hediyeler getirebilsin ve onunla konuşabilsin. Bu hizmetkâr, işte burada dinler ve anlar. Ardından onun arzularına kabilesine aktarır."
